(I'm not involved in the Pred Civil War, I can't say that I've seen 
Tarantulas gain any access codes, but also, Yan, I doubt Dark Mouse could 
blow up the computers in other rooms, or if she could, you should at least 
give an explanation of how she did it.

It'd be like saying "Nemsis Enforcer hacked into the Predacon base and set 
off the self destruct sequence but made it so no one could stop it".  You and 
JP are doing computer stuff, and by just saying with out explanation makes it 
hard to reply to.  Not to mention, you're dealing with stuff that has no 
boundaries set upon.  There's no way to tell if Dark Mouse is better with 
comps. than Tarantulas, but personally I think Tarantulas is probably of a 
greater genius than Dark Mouse.

But anyway, Megatron's group wouldn't necessarily need a computer to flood 
places with dangerous gases.  He could also just shoot stuff in the engine 
room and blow the whole ship up!  Just my two cents to confuse all of you 
even more, mwahahahahahahaha!  Seriously though, if you guys want to get 
around the entire mess, just skip the computers and battle it out.  I know 
trying to find a week old post that you can't even remember is rather 
irritating)


L. Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
